SEARCH
Package graphics

Class ListPane

java.lang.Object
graphics.ListPane
public class ListPane extends Object
Class: ListPane is the class that creates the list of containers in the main of the GUI.
See Also:
  • GUI

    Method: createList() creates the list of containers.

    Method: getInfoGrid() creates and sets up a GridPane with labeled rows for displaying container information.

    getListGrid()
    Method: getGrid() creates the grid that contains the list of containers, with information about their name, id, status and time created.

    Method: getSelectedIndices() returns the indices of the selected containers.

    Method: getTitle() creates the title of the list of containers.
    void
    setBlankGridPane()
    Method: setBlankGridPane() populates the existing GridPane with blank labels, setting their styles and constraints.
    void
    updateGridPane()
    Method: updateGridPane() retrieves container information from MonitorHttpGUI and updates the existing GridPane with labels for each container attribute, such as name, ID, status, image ID, network ID, gateway, IP address, and MAC address.

  • Constructor Details

    • ListPane

      public ListPane()
      Default Constructor

  • Method Details

    • getListGrid

      public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane getListGrid()
      Method: getGrid() creates the grid that contains the list of containers, with information about their name, id, status and time created. The returned grid contains the checkboxes of the containers as well.
      Returns:
      grid: the grid that contains the list of containers.

    • getText

      public javafx.scene.text.Text getText(String text)
      Method: getTitle() creates the title of the list of containers.
      Parameters:
      text - name of Container
      Returns:
      listOfContainers: the title of the list of containers.

    • getSelectedIndices

      public int getSelectedIndices()
      Method: getSelectedIndices() returns the indices of the selected containers.
      Returns:
      selectedIndices: the indices of the selected containers.

    • createList

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox createList()
      Method: createList() creates the list of containers.
      Returns:
      vbox: the list of containers.

    • getInfoGrid

      public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane getInfoGrid()
      Method: getInfoGrid() creates and sets up a GridPane with labeled rows for displaying container information. The grid includes labels for container name, ID, status, image ID, network ID, gateway, IP address, and MAC address.
      Returns:
      gridInfo: the GridPane containing labeled rows for container information

    • updateGridPane

      public void updateGridPane()
      Method: updateGridPane() retrieves container information from MonitorHttpGUI and updates the existing GridPane with labels for each container attribute, such as name, ID, status, image ID, network ID, gateway, IP address, and MAC address. The information is displayed in the second column of the GridPane.

    • setBlankGridPane

      public void setBlankGridPane()
      Method: setBlankGridPane() populates the existing GridPane with blank labels, setting their styles and constraints. This is useful for initializing or clearing the GridPane before updating it with new container information.
